titleStmt.title: A topographie or survey of the county of Kent with some chronological, historicall, and other matters touching the same, and the several parishes and places therein / by Richard Kilburne of Hawkherst, Esquire.
titleStmt.author: Kilburne, Richard, 1605-1678.
